name: Robot Shooter WIP
description:
This game is just a combination of mechanincs from FPS games I liked. You can shoot off body parts of robots, heal yourself by picking up particles dropped by gibbed enemies, throw bombs, double jump... the list goes on. This is just the first level, but I am working on the game and I hope I finish it soon.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space, also you can double jump

Slowmo - Hold down F or press middle mouse button to toggle, has a cooldown (blue bar)

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Throw bomb - Q, charges by dealing damage (green bar)

Pick up weapon - X

Pick up a thing /Discover a task/Press a ,,Restart Encounter" button- E

Reload - R

Show Tasks - ` (above TAB)

Aiming / Gun Ability - Right Mouse Button

Switch between aiming and gun ability - TAB

Use a health pickup - C

You can gib enemies by shooting them in the eye when they are low on HP. Gibbed enemies drop healing particles.  You can discover tasks you have to complete by finding pieces of paper and interacting with them. You can't walk through blue windows but you can shoot through them. Yellow windows do the opposite.
